snippet: A panel of former senior American officials and outside experts asked President Obama to reconsider the likelihood that harsh sanctions will drive Tehran to concessions.
abstract: Panel of former senior American officials and outside experts, including several who recently left Obama administration, issue surprisingly critical assessment of American diplomacy toward Iran, urging Pres Obama to become far more engaged and to reconsider likelihood that harsh sanctions will drive Tehran to concessions.
lead_paragraph: A panel of former senior American officials and outside experts asked President Obama to reconsider the likelihood that harsh sanctions will drive Tehran to concessions.

headline.seo: Report on Iran Urges Obama to Rethink Sanctions
headline.main: Report Urges White House to Rethink Iran Penalties
headline.print_headline: Report Urges White House To Rethink Iran Penalties
